definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The attacker was identified by the state-run Xinhua news agency as Wu Huanming, 48.
sentences.chinese: 中國新華社確認了該襲擊者名爲吳煥明，四十八歲。

sentences.english: Early one morning, Shmi was attacked and abducted by the savage Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 一天清晨，野蠻的塔斯肯襲擊者毆打併綁架了施密。

sentences.english: He said unfortunately one of the attackers managed to escape.
sentences.chinese: 他說，遺憾的是其中一名襲擊者設法逃逸。

sentences.english: The hospital chief executive said the attackers just barged in and fired indiscriminately.
sentences.chinese: 這家醫院院長表示，襲擊者衝進來，亂槍掃射。

sentences.english: The Shabab says it has set up three units of suicide-bombers.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭青年黨宣稱他們已經組建了3自殺襲擊者小組。

sentences.english: Mr. Ramos-Horta says that international peacekeepers were too slow in their attempts to catch his attackers.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾塔說，國際維和部隊追捕襲擊者的行動過於緩慢。

sentences.english: Attackers who do, will be subjected to the disorienting effects of the light.
sentences.chinese: 仍繼續靠近船隻的襲擊者，將遭到激光的眩暈效果。

sentences.english: Yeah. I think the suicide bombers do have ideals.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我認爲自殺式襲擊者是有理想的。

sentences.english: Alam refused to speculate on the attackers motives.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉姆拒絕推測襲擊者動機。

sentences.english: Right? We are kind of suicide bomber.
sentences.chinese: 就像自殺式襲擊者那樣。

sentences.english: The raiders plundered all the cattle.
sentences.chinese: 襲擊者偷走了所有的耕牛。

sentences.english: Xulhaz and a companion were hacked to death by unidentified attackers on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 曼南和一名同伴星期一被身份不明的襲擊者砍死。

sentences.english: En route, they were ambushed by Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 在途中，他們遭到塔斯肯襲擊者的伏擊。

sentences.english: He saw his assailant head straight for the Tour Magdala.
sentences.chinese: 他看到他的襲擊者朝着馬格達拉塔直奔。

sentences.english: The scavenger vessel is called the Raider.
sentences.chinese: 清道夫飛船名爲“襲擊者號”。
